posts.post_content:
Limited budget looking for Pirates.  Would prefer no tears or missing pieces but wrinkles and creases are fine!

Brad
There are some low grade Pirate T205 beaters on the eBay.
Thanks for the heads up. I'm not a huge 205 fan but I love 207 and 206. My dream set is the Tip Top Bread set. Maybe someday!
I have this card which has the top and side borders cut off.  Small scratch, no creases.  Small spot of paper loss on back.  If you're interested, I can send a scan of front and back.  $8 shipped.

Gibson (P150) - beautiful color, minor creases, ding at bottom
Leifield (P460) - creasing, wear at corner
Maddox (Tolstoi) - severe creasing

Send me a PM if you are interested.

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100021/pittsburgh/web.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="Piratesfan1418" post=816803]Limited budget looking for Pirates.  Would prefer no tears or missing pieces but wrinkles and creases are fine!

Brad[/QUOTE]

Email me for details if interested.
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/kawika/forsale/websize/E93%20Leach1.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/kawika/forsale/websize/E93%20Leach2.jpg[/IMG]

I have an Abbaticchio Blue Sleeves with Polar Bear back.  I'd call it G-VG, but it is miscut along the bottom so only the top half of the lettering shows.

I also have a Phillippe with Sweet Cap 350 Fact 30 back.  The front looks VG-EX, but it appears to be slightly trimmed.  The back has some paper loss - looks like it may have been glued into a notebook.

Otherwise, there doesn't appear to be any creases, scuffing or paper loss.

I'd like to sell them as a pair for a total of $35 delivered.

If you're interested, either PM me or shoot me an email and I'll make scans for you.

Best regards,
Craig

Sorry I haven't gotten back to anyone.  I thought I might get a notification of replies made to a thread I started. I'll get back to you all soon when I'm at home on my computer. 

Thanks,

Brad
Brad, here are the scans - Abbaticchio $20 and Phillippe $15.
